title: IS_HELI_TAIL_BOOM_BROKEN
content:
0x2C59F987// IsHeliTailBoomBroken
BOOL IS_HELI_TAIL_BOOM_BROKEN(Vehicle heli);Parameters:heli: The helicopter to checkReturns: Returns true if the helicopter's tail boom is broken, false if it is intact.
codeBlocks:
local ped = PlayerPedId()
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(ped, false)
-- Example usage for IS_HELI_TAIL_BOOM_BROKEN
IsHeliTailBoomBroken(vehicle)
